validations.message:
Recommended property `description` is missing from `FacilityUse`.

A full example looks like this:

```
"description": "An fast paced game that incorporates netball, handball and football."
```

Recommended property `image` is missing from `FacilityUse`.

A full example looks like this:

```
"image": [
  {
    "thumbnail": "http://example.com/static/image/speedball_thumbnail.jpg",
    "@type": "ImageObject",
    "url": "http://example.com/static/image/speedball_large.jpg"
  }
]
```
Recommended property `hoursAvailable` is missing from `FacilityUse`.

Recommended property `offers` is missing from `FacilityUse`.

A full example looks like this:

```
"offers": {
  "@type": "Offer",
  "identifier": "OX-AD",
  "name": "Adult",
  "price": 7.5,
  "priceCurrency": "GBP",
  "url": "https://profile.everyoneactive.com/booking?Site=0140&Activities=1402CBP20150217&Culture=en-GB"
}
```

validations.message:
Recommended property `description` is missing from `FacilityUse`.

A full example looks like this:

```
"description": "An fast paced game that incorporates netball, handball and football."
```

Recommended property `image` is missing from `FacilityUse`.

A full example looks like this:

```
"image": [
  {
    "thumbnail": "http://example.com/static/image/speedball_thumbnail.jpg",
    "@type": "ImageObject",
    "url": "http://example.com/static/image/speedball_large.jpg"
  }
]
```
Recommended property `hoursAvailable` is missing from `FacilityUse`.

Recommended property `offers` is missing from `FacilityUse`.

A full example looks like this:

```

  "@type": "Offer",

  "priceCurrency": "GBP",
  "url": "https://profile.everyoneactive.com/booking?Site=0140&Activities=1402CBP20150217&Culture=en-GB"
}
```
